subject: Economy
question_en: What is the primary objective of the RBI (Reserve Bank of India)?
question_hi: रिवाज़ भारतीय (Reserve Bank of India) का प्रमुख कार्य क्या है?
C_en: Monitoring and regulating the Indian economy
explanation_en: The Reserve Bank of India is primarily responsible for regulating the Indian economy (monitoring and regulating).
explanation_hi: रिवाज़ भारतीय आयोजना और रोजगार मंत्री
explanation_en: The Reserve Bank of India is primarily responsible for regulating the Indian economy (monitoring and regulating).
explanation_hi: रिवाज़ भारतीय आयोजना और रोजगार मंत्री
